title: NIR afterglow nanosystem for photodynamic therapy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22792-22798
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03312D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bingxin Shu, Shubi Zhao, Yuling Zhang, Qinchao Sun, Zhen Huang
The Ru/CYQ@CPPO exhibits afterglow and recharging effect. There was reasonable correlation between afterglow luminescence and the inhibitory rate of tumor cells, which indicates that Ru/CYQ@CPPO holds for facilitating non-invasive, personalized PDT.
